name: Zombie Attack (EtherealGames)
description:
Farmer Koos was mos having a spot of lekker chow then he klapped a klippies. He was about to doss as he was stukkend from the day's grapht when he heard a sound that mos like a ou tannie crying from having a moerse chakalaka poep. "Jirre! Wat die ..." he exclaimed. He grabs his hand gun and heads outside to investigate. (enter scene)

Enjoy!

Special Thanks to:

Donavan Costara (Music)

Rotten One (Music)
